properties.name: app.social.async-enabled
properties.description: Enable async social writes through Kafka.

properties.name: app.social.redis-enabled
properties.description: Enable Redis cache/counters for social features.

properties.name: app.social.kafka-send-timeout
properties.description: Max wait time for Kafka publish acknowledgement.

properties.name: app.social.redis-stats-ttl
properties.description: TTL for Redis post stats hash.

properties.name: app.social.redis-likes-ttl
properties.description: TTL for Redis set of users who liked a post.

properties.name: app.social.redis-posts-ttl
properties.description: TTL for Redis set of known posts.

properties.name: app.analytics.summary-cache-ttl
properties.description: TTL for cached analytics summary response.
